data.eml:eml: First record of the genus Leptanilloides (Hymenoptera: Formicidae: Dorylinae) from the United States

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Macgown, Joe A., Schiefer, Terence L., Branstetter, Michael G. (2015): First record of the genus Leptanilloides (Hymenoptera: Formicidae: Dorylinae) from the United States. Zootaxa 4006 (2): 392-400, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4006.2.10
